Functions

static void _TM_CHx_Config (HT_TM_TypeDef *TMx, TM_CH_Enum Ch, TM_CHP_Enum Pol, TM_CHCCS_Enum Sel, u8 Filter)
 Configure the CHx as input.

Function Documentation

static void _TM_CHx_Config ( HT_TM_TypeDef *  TMx,
TM_CH_Enum  Ch,
TM_CHP_Enum  Pol,
TM_CHCCS_Enum  Sel,
u8  Filter 
) [static]

Configure the CHx as input.

Parameters:
TMx,:where TMx is the selected TM from the TM peripherals.
Ch,:Specify the TM Channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • TM_CH_0 : TM channel 0
  • TM_CH_1 : TM channel 1
  • TM_CH_2 : TM channel 2
  • TM_CH_3 : TM channel 3
Pol,:The input polarity. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • TM_CHP_NONINVERTED : Active high level or rising edge
  • TM_CHP_INVERTED : Active low level or falling edge
Sel,:Specify the input to be used. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • TM_CHCCS_DIRECT : TM CHxI is mapped on CHx.
  • TM_CHCCS_INDIRECT : TM CH1I is mapped on CH0 (or CH0I->CH1 or CH2I->CH3 or CH3I->CH2).
  • TM_CHCCS_TRCED : TM CHx is mapped on TRC.
Filter,:Specify the input capture filter. This parameter must be a value between 0x00 and 0x0F.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 1818 of file ht32f5xxxx_tm.c.
